title: Search Button
description: The SearchButton component provides a customizable search button with a command key icon (⌘K) for modern web applications. It supports multiple size variants and is theme-aware, making it perfect for light and dark mode designs.

body.raw:
# SearchButton Component Documentations The **SearchButton** component is a highly customizable search button that displays a command key icon (⌘K) and supports multiple size variants. It is designed for modern, theme-aware applications that use CSS variables (defined in your global CSS) for light and dark modes. ## Preview and Code Snippet console.log("Tab clicked:", value)}> Preview Code
```tsx import React from "react"; import SearchButton from "@/components/search-button.tsx"; export default function Example() { return (
); } ``` ## Props | Prop | Type | Default | Description | | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | `placeholder` | `string` | `"Search Documentation.."` | The text displayed in the button. | | `size` | `"xs" \| "sm" \| "md" \| "lg" \| "xl"` | `"md"` | Controls the size of the button (affecting padding, font-size, icon size). | | `...props` | `React.ButtonHTMLAttributes` | – | All standard button props are supported. |
